attributes.action: ONE WHEELCHAIR SPACE, IS NOT ENOUGH ON PUBLIC TRANSPORT!.
attributes.additional_details:
ONE WHEELCHAIR SPACE, IS NOT ENOUGH ON PUBLIC TRANSPORT!.

We are asking the Department for Transport, to set a new minimum standard of two wheelchair spaces per bus or coach.

Also similar minimum standard of two wheelchairs spaces per tram / light rail / underground / commuter / intercity and/or international train carriage  too.
